lyrics: Chestnuts roastin' on an open fireJack Frost nippin' at your noseYuletide carols being sung by a choirAnd folks dressed up like EskimosEverybody knowsA turkey and some mistletoehelp to make the season brightTiny tots with their eyes all a-glowwill find it hard sleeping tonightThey know that Santa's on his wayHe's loaded lots of toysan' goodies on his sleighAnd every mother's child is gonna spyTo see if reindeer really knowhow to flyAnd so I'm offering this simple phraseto kids from one to ninety-twoAlthough it's been said many times many waysMerry Christmas to you!And so I'm offering this simple phraseto kids from one to ninety-twoAlthough it's been saidmany times many waysMerry Christmas... to you!
